page.description: Deletes an object in a container. If the object doesn't exist, no error is returned.
page.example:
dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value() dim Item as A5Storage::DataItem = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.DeleteItem("MyTargetPath/MyObject") = .T.
